name: Simon Says: Simon Sim
description:
Test your memory skills with this fun color pattern game!

How to Play

The computer will display a color pattern. After the pattern is displayed, mimic the pattern given and press submit. 

Controls

Use your mouse to click on the buttons. 

*Sound Included

Credits
